website_summaries.verdict: The coated fabric on this heavy-duty cover protects riding lawn and garden tractors from sun damage, rain, dust, birds, and tree sap.
pros: Vented to allow for air to circulate
Ventilation helps prevent ballooning in heavy winds
Coated heavy-duty fabric offers water resistance and repellency
Fits most mowers well with an elastic shock cord in bottom hem
cons: Vents allow moisture under the cover

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money. Buy a better cover
customer_reviews.text: This thing is thin, flimsy, and doesn't even cover my entire 42 inch cub cadet tractor. If I hadn't cut the part where the bag attached to the cover itself I'd return it. But the stupid bag kept flapping against the tractor and made an obnoxious noise
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe how big it is........
customer_reviews.text: My mower has a 42" deck and this thing covered the entire lawn mower even the tires. I am not sure it's waterproof as I have it sheltered a bit. But it's easy to get on and off. I got the green color so I won't see if it get moldy but I will probably throw it in the wash machine once in awhile to clean it. Not sure if you are allowed, but again I don't need waterproof, just something to keep off blowing rain and dirt.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover. I've covered my tractor for two winters with this and it remains flexible and unaffected by the weather. Granted, I park my tractor under my deck, but the deck is covered in planks that let rain and snow drip fall onto the tractor. I can tell that it has faded slightly (comparing the inside to the outside color,) but I get a reasonably price piece of protection that allows me to avoid erecting a shed for the tractor. I will definitely purchase another, if this one ever wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Sometimes Jones

customer_reviews.title: Product badly engineered
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality of the product but I did not like the fact that the storage bag was sewn directly to the cover. I had to redesign it for my use. I had to cut the bag from the cover and get Velcro and sew it on both cover and bag so I can put them together when not using it. This was badly engineered and it was difficult to get it to the point where I could use it for my needs. It was expensive to get the supplies that I needed and there was a large expense of time involved. I hope that this gets to someone who can fix this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R Stice

customer_reviews.title: this is a cheap thin piece of plastic.
customer_reviews.text: this is a cheap thin piece of plastic. you will be lucky if it last a season. i would have been better off buying a grill cover even the cheap ones are thicker than this. it's about as thick as a garbage bag. so don't let anything close to sharp get anywhere near this. i think instead of trying to use this thing i'm going to use a this is a cheap thin piece of plastic. of black plastic.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Henson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't blow away, covers great, Lift the seat before covering
customer_reviews.text: I live in a climate with high winds and thunderstorms, snow, hail, burning hot in the summer, and southwest monsoons. This has not blown away like everything else does outside. I'm very happy with this and will help keep my Craftsman lawn tractor chair from cracking. Don't forget to lift the seat before covering to help ensure no rain puddles in the seat, which doesn't feel good on the seat of your pants.
customer_reviews.author: Pinklaw

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: After the sticker price of riding mower covers in local stores, I settled on this one. It has an elastic bottom and a large tag that reads "Front". So it was easy to put on. My mower is the 46 inch deck one and it was a snug fit. I do wish the material was a tad thicker but if it keeps my mower dry and doesn't tear, I will be happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: omg

customer_reviews.title: NOT Flimsy. Covers my 48" John Deere well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace another cover that had become riddled with holes. There are a couple of things I like much better about this cover: 1. The vents are to the side of the seat. My last one had the vent directly over the back of the seat. I think this may have led to leaking on the seat itself. 2. The material is heavier than the previous one. I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Water Brands

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have purchased.. What I like about it is it covers the entire 42" mower including the mower deck! It has a strong elastic and for winter I add bungee fastening points to add bungee's because it sits exposed to strong winds and snow.. These covers hold up a couple years and I have tried others and they do NOT cover the entire mower!
customer_reviews.author: RayBo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rider Mower Cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Troy Bilt Pony perfectly... wraps around the tires and full mowing deck. Keeps rain off the mower. Has vents to keep strong winds from carrying it far, far away. This is the second time I've bought this product. I love it! I bought the first one from Amazon on 6/29/2012 and by May 2014, the cover was pale and torn. So this item lasted just about 2 years and keep in mind it is outside covering my mower under the burning rays of the sun and exposed to all the elements. My opinion is that lasting 2 years under those conditions is pretty good. Great price, too! The most important thing is that it protects my mower.
customer_reviews.author: Goblinthrasher

customer_reviews.title: mediocre fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre quality and fit; bought it to cover my new John Deere sit down mover.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence r. souza

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great less expensive option to cover our John Deere mower. We’ll see how it holds up this winter. Looks nice too with the light shade of green.
customer_reviews.author: love amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Took the cover out of the box and was very pleased with the texture and overall quality of the cover. Will have to wait for its longevity. Very strong elastic band on the bottom of the cover to help keep the cover on.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben C.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Product description was perfect. Fit my small camp Simplicity 38 inch deck tractor perfectly. Decent quality for a mid range cover. Not as good as their delux cover that I have for my side by side, but you get more than you pay for. Exactly what I have come to expect from Classic Accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great color. This is a lot nicer than I thought it would be. I am very happy with this purchase! For my mower like a glove. Thick and durable! After a heavy thunderstorm, I checked the mower and there was no water whatsoever under the cover!
customer_reviews.author: Christi Long

customer_reviews.title: Two years later...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's OK. Whatever waterproofing it had wore off quickly. When it's wet, it will stick to the mower underneath. I suppose I'll have to buy an outdoor waterproofing spray. The color also faded quickly, which is not a big deal. But, it hasn't ripped yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff from Boston

customer_reviews.title: Oct 29 2019
customer_reviews.text: I've had it since it rained very hard here on the Gulf Coast and it did not fail..It caught the rain and didn't go through the cover at all keeps it dry.
customer_reviews.author: 228rod52

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover a John Deere LT160. My impression is that it will fit nearly every riding lawn mower sold at Home Depot or Lowes. Mine has a 42" deck and it's easily large enough to cover the entire mower deck and all four tires. For the price at Amazon, there is no reason to buy the one with the John Deere logo just for looks. In fact, the drab green color blends in good with the natural surrounding out back vs. a dark black cover. Definitely will buy another one once the sun and UV wears this one out.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Tractor stays dry
customer_reviews.text: Had a giant tarp that I would drop over my tractor (which I guess did the same thing) but I would also have to worry about if the tarp is strapped down in the event of wind. This fit likes a glove on my craftsman. Stays dry and easy to put on and off. Highly recommend this if you're looking for a simple cover for your riding mower.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nope...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last a month. I wouldn't waste any money on this one. On to a more durable cover for me.
customer_reviews.author: DBD

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last forever or at least several years
customer_reviews.text: Pros: overall fits fine Cons: lasted two years outdoors then dry rots Second one purchased
customer_reviews.author: Jose Emanious

customer_reviews.title: Lawn machine cover
customer_reviews.text: The mower has been in several heavy rainstorms since I covered it. I found the machine stays dry and protected. That's exactly why I purchased the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy M.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems great after about a month or two of use. Been through some heavy southern rain storms and looks to keep the rain and debris out with no damage to the cover or tractor. Some minor sun fading, but it is kept out in the open so that’s expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Lawn tractor cover.
customer_reviews.text: This cover fit great and covers our riding lawn mower perfect. The material is very sturdy for the outside weather. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Janet Hightower

customer_reviews.title: Protects tractor from sun and most rain.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. I bought it for my very old SEARS mower tractor. Covers well. Easy to put on/off. BE SURE THAT THE ENGINE, ETC. IS COOL so the exhaust doesn't burn the cover. NO, I didn't do that. It's just common sense! Not completely water proof, but darn close.
customer_reviews.author: Still Laughing

customer_reviews.title: Large enough to fit a John Deere 318 Garden Tractor
customer_reviews.text: I was mainly looking for size and cost when searching for a cover for my tractor. It was large enough to cover my John Deere 318 garden tractor. However it's no waterproof. Ive taken the cover off after a few rain storms and every time the tractor is wet. It seems to deflect some water, however I need one that is waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: David Frady

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a while, just installed today. Perfect fit, material good, set for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore A Sundin

customer_reviews.title: Well built.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality, keeps the tractor relatively dry and it fits nicely on a Troy Bilt super Bronco. It’s starting to rip so it will probably last a year at the most.
customer_reviews.author: OBGX54

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for the money
customer_reviews.text: Had a cover just like this previously. Lasted about 4 years and the elastic around the bottom finally gave out. I believe it lasted as expected for the money. Was outside the entire time. New cover is working fine. Rain water runs right off and elastic is good and tight around the bottom, keeping the cover on in high wind situations. I am completely satisfied with my purchase. Cover is being used on a larger garden tractor with 50" mower deck. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kyhunter

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this cover
customer_reviews.text: Yes, great cover fits great only wish they could make it longer like 110” so it can cover the leaf bags on the tractor! If they do make a longer on I will purchase it! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: james c. nichols

customer_reviews.title: Extremely  Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty construction and well designed for the purpose. Marked Front and back which is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Above average!
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a cover, since we can't fit 2 cars and a large riding mower in our 2 car garage. Wanted a durable water proof cover.
customer_reviews.author: Linda aka Ace

customer_reviews.title: The more provement
customer_reviews.text: Nice product you still need weight to keep it from flying off and win I wish I had a tie on it instead of stretch
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: Good So Far
customer_reviews.text: This lawnmower cover has been met my expectations. I have had it on my mower for over a month. It covers my mower from the bottom of the wheels to the top of the mower deck lever. And from the front to back. I have not noticed any moisture under the cover, but we have not had any excessive precipitation lately. The material is lightweight, yet sturdy. The elastic helps make a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover. Would buy more for other toys. Covers great and fully.
customer_reviews.author: Dayanis

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover in 5 years ago and it lasted NY sun/snow weather, outdoors and/or under a tree for all this time. The reason I'm buying a new one is that the last storm blew the cover away and I couldn't find it anymore. This cover is super inexpensive and totally worth it. Great product. I used on CubCadet LT1045 46" Deck.
customer_reviews.author: Rob V.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and size
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and size. I have three mowers and bought one for each and they look great, considering two of my mowers are not that attractive..the color is nice and blends in with the grass and trees so they sorta disappear. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Good cover for the money. We use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Cover is sturdy and easy to slip on and off
customer_reviews.text: Cover is sturdy and easy to slip on and off. Fits my tractor mower perfectly which sits outdoors in all weather. Had one for 20 years, had to replace it. The rodents liked it too much, had it chewed full of holes.
customer_reviews.author: martie

customer_reviews.title: Lawn Tractor cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover for my troy build lawn mower. I live on the coast of NC and I wanted a cover that would stay on and not blow away with our high winds. Not only does this cover stay on its also rain repellant. I think its one of the best purchases I have made in years. I'm kind of curious in a year if it fades from the sun beating down on it. I would highly recommend buying this product if your in the market for a lawn mower cover.
customer_reviews.author: J. Michales

customer_reviews.title: Fits a John Deere mower, kind of lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as thick or heavy as my last cover, and that one only lasted 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: J. Perry

customer_reviews.title: It fits
customer_reviews.text: Fits around our lawn tractor well. Covers the deck and the front and back tires completely. I don't expect this cover to last a very very long time but we should have a better solution by the time it does wear out. It does feel a bit flimsy and thin. I didn't want to invest any more money on a 'deluxe' version because we may not need it for more than a season or two. I'm satisfied and think the price and quality are suitable.
customer_reviews.author: Beka P

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: though the material is thinner than expected was happy with product. Easy on & off, waterproof and material being thin makes using it easier, I would of gave a 5 Star but bought in Aug 2019, 8 months after buying with it not being taken on & off during the winter months elastic broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I have a cub cadet with a 50" deck and it covers what I want covered but doesn't completely cover the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: It completely covers my 38 in Bolens riding lawn mower, seems to be completely waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great value, purchased for my John Deere D110, great fit, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: EQ

customer_reviews.title: DON'T DO IT
customer_reviews.text: IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR WATERPROOF THEN THIS C*** IS NOT FOR YOU. GREATLY OVERPRICED FOR THIS SHODDY CHINESE TRASH. SUBJECT TO SUN DAMAGE. RIPPED ALREADY.
customer_reviews.author: XRQ

customer_reviews.title: Good cover ... the naysayers are wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cover on for a bit. It is actually working well. The rubberized gather around the bottom is really strong. I have been through heavy rain, and hot sun ... not a hint of trouble. It is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: JumpDog

customer_reviews.title: Fit JD 155c perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fits my JD 155c perfect. Wish it had some tie down loops though.
customer_reviews.author: velasmess35

customer_reviews.title: Better than the JD Product
customer_reviews.text: When we bought our lawn tractor.four years ago we also got a cover from John Deere. It was twice the cost of this product. Apparently we were paying a premium price for the logo. It was not nearly as strong a fabric and the elastic as the bottom did not provide a good fit and often the cover blew off from a strong wind. This product solved both those issues. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HockeyRx

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Lawnmower gets a little wetter then I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The product has worked great for me, Keeps my tractor dry, easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: Ok, but lasted a whole SEVEN months in the south Texas sun.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Okay, having received it, I will admit it is NOT super-ultra-heavy-duty stuff that will last forever. But it's certainly sturdier than I thought it might be based on some other reviews, and I think a very fair value for the price. I'm guesstimating it will last 3-5 seasons based on prior covers I've had (that cost much more). For the price... I'll buy a new one in 4-5 years and be perfectly happy.
customer_reviews.author: KC Jones

customer_reviews.title: Glovelike fit and easily stored. NOT waterproof. Mower gets wet.
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits like a glove and stays put. Easy on and off. I love the attached storage bag, no chasing it if windy. Nicely contained.Howevef unlike the original purchase it is NOT waterproof thus leaving the mower a soggy mess after a rain.
customer_reviews.author: David Coe

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Cover is definitely large enough. I like the elastic band it snugs on to the tractor very well.
customer_reviews.author: Stillnotsuperman

customer_reviews.title: Lawn Mower Cover
customer_reviews.text: It covers the entire tractor...tires...blade guard. Even under very windy conditions it stayed in tact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cover up
customer_reviews.text: I have a good/used lawn mower that I didn't have room in my shed for when I bought a new one. The cover works great to keep the old mower out of the weather. It fits well, is made of strong material and will last for a good while. I like the color and the elastic fitting at the bottom to hold it on. I also like having the attached bag to put the cover in when no longer in use.
customer_reviews.author: N. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Dependable in all weather conditions
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes it is for my lawn mower and it's green.
customer_reviews.author: David L Priefer

customer_reviews.title: Did not last (long enough)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover in September 2010. So far it was a nice and inexpensive cover, until now. The cover has become so brittle that even looking at it creates a tear. I wish it would have lasted longer than just two years.Ok, it has survived several strong storms and even two hurricanes. Still no reason to literally fall apart. Trying to find something better......
customer_reviews.author: Grizzly

customer_reviews.title: Lawn Tractor Cover
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover, It Fits perfectly with room to spare, I would definitively by another if needed. !!!
customer_reviews.author: bigd

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first. Quality product after al). Fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Sure helppedmower to keep looking new
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 2 years now and it keeps lawnmower dry and clean
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I needed. It is heavy duty, has vents, and fits my 48 in mower just right. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kehrlein

customer_reviews.title: Great cover so far!
customer_reviews.text: Have only had the cover a short time, but so far the quality of the material is excellent, and have had cover go through a few major rainstorms and it stayed on the mower and kept it perfectly dry!
customer_reviews.author: Sparktrician480

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for sharp edges!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 34" zero turn mower. Removed the cover and inspected it. Looks good becare full of sharp edges on mower it could tear the material. As you can tell by pic it covers the ZT mower completely. It fits better if you engage the handles, with handles out the cover is tight. Now see how long it lasts.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fits my cub cadet perfectly and the 'FRONT' marker makes it easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Tammieaj

customer_reviews.title: A great option when you don't have a covered space to ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly covers my Craftsman ride on mower. Has held up in the rain and wind. I've had it about 5 months so can't attest to longevity, but I expect it to last a couple seasons. A great option when you don't have a covered space to store your mower.
customer_reviews.author: earnestxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cover as a summer protection against rain tree sap and baking in the sun. It fits very well and the elasticized strip makes it easy to secure and holds well. It does a fairly good job with the rain, however small amounts do get through at times. In summary I would say it is a decent summer time cover
customer_reviews.author: Solstice

customer_reviews.title: Had it for a year and still feels sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a year and still feels sturdy and strong. Bought a cheap version before this one that fell apart in several months of use and Phoenix Sun exposure. When this one expires, I will be getting an identical replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Albin Kulvinskas

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, comes with a carry bag attached and is very well made
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good preformance
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Vintage Sears Suburban and covers completely. Does seem to allow moisture to leak thru or collect underneath, but is still better than the tractor exposed to the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great lawnmower cover
customer_reviews.text: So excited, it fit my John Deere mower great. Very nice fabric, also great price.
customer_reviews.author: PTempest

customer_reviews.title: Proper size
customer_reviews.text: It’s water proof and hopefully more durable than the original.
customer_reviews.author: James Clontz

customer_reviews.title: Would buy another one in a minute !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does the cover look great. It also goes all the way to the ground. We have some bad winters in N. E. PA. I feel sure the cover will take the abuse. It has already been rained on and the waterproofing worked excellent. I would recommend this cover to anyone who has a tractor that is exposed to the weather. It is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: fred kolb

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it for a couple of weeks now, but it has done well so far through several storms. Good quality material feel, and the bottom has an elastic band to help keep it tucked under the lawn mower.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: great material, high winds did not blow' it off ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my riding mower as if it was made for it, now need to order another one for my other mower, great material, high winds did not blow' it off since the whole bottom has elastic to hold it down. Great item for the cost
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: A good solid mower cover
customer_reviews.text: So far it's a good cover. Fits soundly on my 42" Craftsman mower without issue. Hasn't blown off in any high winds, has yet to produce any punctures, has not let any water in through the cover, and still looks the same green as when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Cosby Wood

customer_reviews.title: We are Very Happy with this well-made cover.
customer_reviews.text: This Lawn Tractor Cover is well made and the fabric is sturdy. It is easy to put on our lawn mower, yet has enough "fit" and elastic around the bottom to keep it on the tractor during high winds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy cover for mower. We had 14" of rain and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jane hanson

customer_reviews.title: So far - Very good. Fits really well and heavy fabric keeps weather ...
customer_reviews.text: So far - Very good. Fits really well and heavy fabric keeps weather out. Will probably purchase a spare cover in case of unexpected problems.
customer_reviews.author: D Robb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit on my Husqvarna YTH22V46 46" Riding Mower
customer_reviews.text: It fits my Husqvarna YTH22V46 46" Riding Mower perfectly, covers the whole deck and fits snugly over the tires. The quality seems to be excellent, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: straightalker

customer_reviews.title: Fits!
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for the money. Fit my JD 190C 54" mower perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Theatre Dude

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover for the price. You have to careful when placing or removing from tractor. You feel as if will rip.
customer_reviews.author: Esdee

customer_reviews.title: Great Tractor Cover
customer_reviews.text: We have been using a sheet for a couple of years to cover our riding mower. We never thought that they made covers for them. Of course they make covers for almost everything now and were really glad to find this one. It covers our 42" Ariens riding mower just right and sure does look better than a sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky L. Morison

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality easy to install and perfect fit for my mower.
customer_reviews.author: Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof, but knew that.
customer_reviews.text: These are not waterproof and from reading the other comments I knew that when I purchased the cover. I also knew it wouldn't cover the clippings bins mounted on the back of the tractor. They keep the bird droppings and other stuff off the tractor and it does what's expected of tractor cover.
customer_reviews.author: rrr

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: No room in the garage for my tractor, and this works pretty well for me. The color faded quite quickly in our Houston summer sun, and it's not entirely water proof, but it's holding up pretty well so far. In hind sight it would probably help a lot to spray with a water repellent and UV protection
customer_reviews.author: G S Waybright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, cheaper and better than Lowe's or Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Racine

customer_reviews.title: came quickly, well packaged, fits craftsman ride on ...
customer_reviews.text: came quickly, well packaged, fits craftsman ride on lawn mower, a bit of a struggle to get it in place but will not blow off.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good cover. Not thick as I thought it would ...
customer_reviews.text: Good cover . Not thick as I thought it would be .
customer_reviews.author: James F. Maness

customer_reviews.title: It's not as thick as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: It's not as thick as I had hoped, but we park under a carport anyways. It works great to keep dust/debris, and some rain off the mower.. covers great - works on a cub cadet, and lets air through so no mold gets on it. Stays on very well, never blows off in a storm. VERY Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new Cub tractor and I can't say enough. Well made, perfect weight and easy on and off. Its vented and the front is marked to it's not a hassle figuring it out. I like the storage bag stays attached so you don't lose it. This cover goes over the deck and wheels for total protection
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Survived hurricane Harvey.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't in the direct path but we saw the effects of Harvey. Cover stayed on! Great protection and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: chris2fer

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: What can you say? It covers the tractor. I gave it 5-stars because it was a much better DEAL than the hardware store or at Sears. My experience with the OEM covers is they last about 2-3 years before they fade and start cracking. I won't know about this one for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: T.K.

customer_reviews.title: It did the job I needed it to do
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to put over the riding mower because "Front" is clearly marked. It has good air vents that does not allow rain to get in. It stays in place even in strong winds. I have it on the mower a the back of the house which is facing North. It stays looking clean and neat.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lones

customer_reviews.title: Qaulity product for good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, multiple covered vents, elastic around bottom and end ties hold in place well, even in stormy wind. Seems water proof. Fit my Craftsman 42” mower perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: LLK18

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and Fit my 50 inch Cub Cadet ride on ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and Fit my 50 inch Cub Cadet ride on Lawn Tractor
customer_reviews.author: George Vandervort

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: The cover fits my Troybuilt 42" lawn tractor perfectly. I installed cover immediately after receiving. The cover seems to be well made and good quality.I believe this cover will last a long time. I will recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap cover
customer_reviews.text: I do not own a riding lawn mower, however I do own an old Polaris quad which I keep outside. I was too lazy to go out and measure it, but I figured it was close to a riding mower size. This cover almost reaches over the entire thing, only the front tires stick out. The material is strong and the vents are a nice touch. A few days after I put it on we had a huge rain/wind storm and it stayed on no problem. A great solution to covering all your outdoor 4 wheeled tractor sized vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Conform3

product_meta.title: Classic Accessories Lawn Tractor Cover, Olive, Up to 54" Decks
product_meta.description:
All-season protection for your lawn tractor, this cover is made of durable, weather-protected fabric. Coated for maximum water resistance and repellency, it protects against rain and snow, sun damage, dust, tree sap and birds, while dual vents let air circulate and prevent lofting in high winds. The heavy-duty fabric won't shrink or stretch, and the elastic shock cord in the bottom hem provides a slip-on, custom-like fit. Includes a handy integrated storage sack. Fits most lawn and garden tractors with a deck up to 54".

AMAZON.COM


Fit Info 

CLASSIC ACCESSORIES TRACTOR COVER, GREEN
The Classic Accessories Tractor Cover provides all season protection for lawn or garden tractors against UV damage, rain, dirt, birds and tree sap. Durable, weather-X fabric protects with water-resistant backing for weather and abrasion protection, while reinforced air vents circulate air and prevent the cover from ballooning in winds. An elastic shock cord in the bottom hem creates a quick and custom fit. Complete with an integrated storage bag this cover will fit most lawn and garden tractors with a deck up to 54 inches. Backed by a 1-year warranty.



FEATURES:
 * Fits all Lawn and Garden Tractors with a deck up to 54 ”, up to 72”L x 44”W x 46”H 
 *  Weather-X™ fabric with water-resistant backing for weather and abrasion protection 
 *  Protects against UV damage, rain, dirt, birds and tree sap 
 *  Reinforced air vent lets air circulate and helps prevent ballooning in winds 
 *  Elastic shock cord in bottom hem for a quick, custom fit 
 *  Integrated storage bag 
 *  1-year warranty

Randall G. Bennett5.0 out of 5 stars So Far This Cover is Working Great For Me at a Bargain PriceReviewed in the United States on September 7, 2019Verified Purchase I have a 52 inch cut Gravely ZTR that I was keeping in an open barn. Unfortunately the mice decided that it was the perfect place to build a nest and this caused me to have to replace some engine parts. I liked keeping the mower in the barn but I hate taking it to the dealer for repairs so I started looking around for a cover. I found several available on Amazon mostly at $50 and up until I ran across this particular cover. The price definitely got my attention so I decided "why not" and ordered it. Since it was designed for a lawn tractor I wondered if it would cover a ZTR but after several attempts (and finding the tag that says "front") I managed to get it on and it covered my mower completely as you can see in the photos. I did fold the seat forward and put the steering sticks on top so it would be shaped more like a tractor but that is certainly not a problem. It fits great and keeps the weather and MICE out too. They would have to get out in the open to get to my mower now and we have a couple of cats that would definitely make short work of them. I like this cover and give it my unqualified recommendation.Read more 2 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse WBC Coach4.0 out of 5 stars This will give you a good idea of what to expect in terms of durability ...Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2014Verified Purchase I just ordered my third one in 5 years in my moderate NC climate. This will give you a good idea of what to expect in terms of durability and value. Fit is very good on my 48" deck Husqvarna lawn tractor with some room to spare. Do find puddles on the seat fairly regularly but don't know exactly why as the rest of the tractor shows zero signs of accumulated condensation, leakage, or rust under any conditions. Cover RARELY ever comes loose. In other words, this thing really does its job...except for the minor inconvenience of the puddle on the seat. I suspect somehow the two rear vents must let in some moisture either in the form of rain or condensation that has only ever accumulated on the seat. Not a huge deal since the tractor, including the deck, has been well protected for all the years I've been using this exact model of nylon cover. I only give 4 stars because I think it should be made to last longer than two years with much of that time, in previous years at least, spent in open shade and not in direct sun. Please note that this past year I did leave the covered tractor in the sun for the whole year and the cover disintegrated after about 1 year. Thus, this was a "rush" order since my tractor is presently unprotected and the shredded old cover is in the trash. Cover gave way without warning.Read more 20 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse tm5.0 out of 5 stars Good light duty coverReviewed in the United States on September 25, 2018Verified Purchase Fits most standard size lawn tractors. Mine has a 44" deck. I think this cover will last me a long time. During the season my tractor is parked in dense shade. Barely any sun gets to it at all. I only use the cover on it if there is a chance of rain in the forecast. In winter I store it in the garage till the spring. So the cover won't see ice and snow either. I like the air vents it has. Good to have air vents in summer. Many covers don't have them. The green color looks really good. Much nicer than black. The only thing I don't like about the cover is the storage bag is sewn on and does not come off unless you cut it.Read more 3 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse Wes1.0 out of 5 stars Dont waste your money. Buy a better coverReviewed in the United States on August 2, 2018Verified Purchase This thing is thin, flimsy, and doesn't even cover my entire 42 inch cub cadet tractor. If I hadn't cut the part where the bag attached to the cover itself I'd return it. But the stupid bag kept flapping against the tractor and made an obnoxious noiseRead more 6 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse Will4.0 out of 5 stars Good cover for a good price!Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2015Verified Purchase We've had this cover for about two years, and are now buying a replacement. After two years of exposure to the elements, the fabric became weak and it tore when installing it (snagged on part of the lawn tractor). I suspect that's about what one would expect from this kind of material

On the plus side, this is an easy-to-use cover, and I really like that it has a sewn-in tab at the front that says "FRONT." Sure makes it easy to know which way to put it on! :) It has done a good job in keeping the lawn tractor out of the sunshine and wetness.

On the negative side, there were a few times when we had the cover installed in what appeared to be the correct manner, but it still got water on the tractor seat. I'm not sure if we had it on crooked and it rained, or what, but it only happened on occasion.

Overall, we're buying it again, so I guess that means we like it!Read more 7 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse Liazard3.0 out of 5 stars Decent product, but doesn't stand up to the sunReviewed in the United States on February 9, 2014Verified Purchase Still buying them probably mostly because it fits my tractor so well. On the other hand, I'm going on my third one in four years because durability is very limited. I pinched the material today to lift it up off the tractor and it just ripped. Tested some other areas and yep, it's pretty much completely failed. I went into my Amazon orders and noticed I'm ordering one about every 2 years, that's about how long they last in the Florida sun. And about 4 months of that it was in the garage with the cover stored away. Seems like it could be made of much better, thicker fabric for the price.

Of course, any nylon fabric will fade, crack, lose water repellancy and/or deteriorate after a couple of years in the sun. This is a decent product, better than most. Great color. Looks much better in the yard (and fades less) than the black ones.

When it wears out buy another. A tad cheaper than a $20,000 garage.Read more 10 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse TK4.0 out of 5 stars I can't believe how big it is........Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2019Verified Purchase My mower has a 42" deck and this thing covered the entire lawn mower even the tires. I am not sure it's waterproof as I have it sheltered a bit. But it's easy to get on and off. I got the green color so I won't see if it get moldy but I will probably throw it in the wash machine once in awhile to clean it. Not sure if you are allowed, but again I don't need waterproof, just something to keep off blowing rain and dirt.Read more One person found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse Sometimes Jones5.0 out of 5 stars Great ProtectionReviewed in the United States on December 26, 2017Verified Purchase I love this cover. I've covered my tractor for two winters with this and it remains flexible and unaffected by the weather. Granted, I park my tractor under my deck, but the deck is covered in planks that let rain and snow drip fall onto the tractor. I can tell that it has faded slightly (comparing the inside to the outside color,) but I get a reasonably price piece of protection that allows me to avoid erecting a shed for the tractor. I will definitely purchase another, if this one ever wears out.Read more 2 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse See all reviews from the United States TOP INTERNATIONAL REVIEWS
